items.title: Merck breaks ground on $3B manufacturing plant in Virginia
items.description: Merck is breaking ground on a new 400,000-square-foot manufacturing facility in Elkton, Virginia, as part of its $70 billion U.S. investment strategy.

items.title: Nestle to cut 16,000 jobs as part of cost savings initiative
items.description: New Nestle CEO Philipp Navratil is implementing a workforce reduction of 16,000 positions to accelerate growth and achieve substantial cost cuts.
